member.name: T:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.MissingDocstringAnalyzer
member.summary: Python-specific rule that checks for missing docstrings.

member.name: P:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.MissingDocstringAnalyzer.RequireClassDocstring
member.summary: Whether to require docstrings for public classes.

member.name: P:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.MissingDocstringAnalyzer.RequireFunctionDocstring
member.summary: Whether to require docstrings for public functions.

member.name: P:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.MissingDocstringAnalyzer.MinFunctionLength
member.summary: Minimum function length before requiring a docstring.

member.name: P:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.MissingDocstringAnalyzer.SkipPrivate
member.summary: Whether to skip private functions (starting with _).

member.name: T:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.Pep8NamingAnalyzer
member.summary: Python-specific rule that enforces PEP 8 naming conventions.

member.name: P:RuleKeeper.Rules.Python.Pep8NamingAnalyzer.AllowPrivateUnderscore
member.summary: Whether to allow leading underscores for private members.
